amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Health and Human Services; report; public record.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The Department of Health and Human Services shall provide a report to the Governor and the Legislature no later than December 1 each year regarding the data and information collected pursuant to section 43-516, including a summary of such data and information.
(2) The data and information collected under such section shall be considered a public record under section 84-712.01.
